column2: Unlocks the recipe to craft Liturgy.
Used in the Mystic Forge to create endless versions of Halloween tonics.
The creature obeys! It praises Joko, in its way.
Rankings for the Gold league of the 2004 WvW Tournament.
Number of times the leader placed in 3rd.
Double-click to transform for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed. Combine with an Endless Halloween Enchantment in the Mystic Forge to create an endless version.
The creature acts out. It's getting aggressive.
Number of times the leader placed in 2nd.
<c=@abilitytype>Costume Brawl.</c> Reach out and attack other brawlers.
The creature is completely out of control. It won't obey you.
This creature isn't interested in that food.
This kit contains one of the following colors.
The creature is no longer listening to you.

Gain aegis and cast Shards of Faith when disabled.
Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.
You need a quaggan's key to open this door.
Collect herbs for the quaggan farmers.
The grawl probably won't kill you now.
Petulo the Effusive is about to show off some moves.
Beaming Chalen is about to show off some moves.
As long as team scores are identical, overtime will continue.
